description:
This ultra-spacious family home in Hoppers crossing's sought after Bellbridge Estate. You feel the space and peace. The moment you arrive at this beautiful family home. Situated on a secure 906sqm (approx) of land in a quiet location. Centrally located in the heart of Hoppers Crossing you have every amenity possible within walking distance. Primary and secondary schools, early
learning centres, Pacific Werribee and the Hoppers Crossing train station are massive draw cards to the area and are a short drive.

The family-minded floor plan comprises 3 generously sized bedrooms, including a large fully carpeted master bedroom serviced via two ways central bathroom and toilet, remaining 2 bedrooms are all well-sized and are enhanced by built-in robes. Also, it features a spacious separate laundry. Upon entering through the front doors, the home oozes light filled open spaces and it prides itself to create a relaxed and luxurious family & contemporary living with its incredible design and size, which includes a formal lounge & meals area.

This luxuriously large family domain is the central point and includes a large contemporary kitchen equipped with a gas cook top, pantry, ample drawers, cupboard storage and impressive bench space. The premium features do not stop there; you will also get zoned ducted heating.

When you venture outside, the sliding doors open out onto a beautiful undercover pergola and shed to store your extra stuff. Meant to enjoy all year round with friends and family. Also, you will surely be impressed by the low-maintenance front yard.

All the local amenities are a short distance, such as:
Abundance of schools in the surrounding areas such as Bellbridge Primary School, Truganina South Primary School, Al-Taqwa College, and Westbourne Grammar School. It also includes Hoppers Crossing Train Station, Childcare, Pacific Werribee Shopping Centre, medical precincts, Sports ground, cafes, restaurants, Aqua Pulse and backs on to the Skeleton Creek Linear Reserve
Nature Trail!

Homes like this are not readily available and this is certainly an opportunity that you do not want to miss.

Grab this golden opportunity now and Call Pratik Shah on 0430 437 402 or Jalpa Patel on 0477 086 847 to arrange an inspection at your convenience before it's too late.
